rukus.text: Allahu Al-Ladhi Ja`ala Lakumu Al-'An`am Litarkabu Minha Wa Minha Ta'kuluna
Wa Lakum Fiha Manafi`u Wa Litablughu `Alayha Hajatan Fi Sudurikum Wa `Alayha Wa `Ala Al-Fulki Tuhmaluna
Afalam Yasiru Fi Al-'Arđi Fayanzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Kanu 'Akthara Minhum Wa 'Ashadda Quwatan Wa 'Atharaan Fi Al-'Arđi Fama 'Aghna `Anhum Ma Kanu Yaksibuna
Falamma Ja'at/hum Rusuluhum Bil-Bayyinati Farihu Bima `Indahum Mina Al-`Ilmi Wa Haqa Bihim Ma Kanu Bihi Yastahzi'un
Falamma Ra'aw Ba'sana Qalu 'Amanna Billahi Wahdahu Wa Kafarna Bima Kunna Bihi Mushrikina
Falam Yaku Yanfa`uhum 'Imanuhum Lamma Ra'aw Ba'sana Sunnata Allahi Allati Qad Khalat Fi `Ibadihi Wa Khasira Hunalika Al-Kafiruna
